channel.title: CVE Feed for WP Cloud Plugins -- Out-of-the-Box
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WP Cloud Plugins -- Out-of-the-Box

item.title: CVE-2021-42547|2024-08-04T03:38:48.826Z -- wp%20cloud%20plugins -- out-of-the-box
item.description: Insufficient Input Validation in the search functionality of Wordpress plugin Out-of-the-Box prior to 1.20.3 allows unauthenticated user to craft a reflected Cross-Site Scripting attack.
